name: ai-news-radar
description: AI News Radar - High-quality AI/tech news aggregator

scripts.build: pip install -r requirements.txt && if [ -f feeds/follow.opml ]; then python scripts/update_news.py --output-dir data --window-hours 24 --rss-opml feeds/follow.opml; else python scripts/update_news.py --output-dir data --window-hours 24; fi
